text: I feel like your english teacher is way less strict than my spanish teacher. My spanish teacher was supposed to forget english for thirty minutes and he forgot it for two whole hours and stubbornly refused to tell me the word for ceiling while laughing his butt off ğŸ˜‚ so my spanish exam ended in me literally begging to say one word in english ğŸ˜‚ i offered you the chance to speak spanish at any time and opt out of the game. I almost got you to correct my grammar there once for sure. ğŸ˜„
